name: Wizard's Death
description:
Wizard's Death * When a wizard dies where do they go, when a tree falls over.  Then you find out see if you can escape your death,  and come  back to the Living World.

*

Controls : Move: WASD    Tab: Talk/Read Warp : Space      Aim  & Shoot: Mouse Pointer/Click to shoot  

Credits :

We did all Our Own Artwork /Programing 

An used FreeSound.org for most of the sounds.

Check Out Our Page :   BossCoupleGames - itch.io

Git Project Flies : BossCoupleGames/Wizards-Death: GameDevTv Jam 2022 May 29 (github.com)
